mapper.select: select prc,term, svc_id from svc where knd=2

with svc_time as ( select distinct client_id , Regexp_Substr(work_time,'[^,]+', 1,level) work_time From trainer t where work_time Is Not Null and t.work_loc1||' '||t.work_loc2 = '대구 달서구' and substr(sun || mon || tue || wed || thu || fri || sat, to_char(to_date('21-11-17','yy-mm-dd'), 'D'),1 ) = 1 Connect By Regexp_Substr('10,11,12,13,14', '[^,]+', 1,level) Is Not Null MINUS select client_id2, Regexp_Substr(svc_bgn_tm,'[^,]+', 1,level) work_time from reser_list where reser_dt = #{reser_dt} Connect By Regexp_Substr(svc_bgn_tm, '[^,]+', 1,level) is not null )
Select distinct c.client_id as client_id2, c.name from svc_time s, client c where work_time = #{work_time} and s.client_id = c.client_id
mapper.insert:
SELECT reser_seq.nextval FROM dual
insert into reser_list(reser_no, reser_dt, memo, reser_loc, pet_id1, svc_bgn_tm, svc_stts, client_id1, svc_id, pet_id2, client_id2, enroll_dt) values(#{reser_no}, #{reser_dt}, #{memo},#{adres1}||','||#{adres2}, #{pet_id1}, #{svc_bgn_tm}, 1, #{client_id1}, #{svc_id},#{pet_id2},#{client_id2}, sysdate)
mapper.select: select count(*) from reser_list l, svc s, client c where l.client_id2 = c.client_id and s.svc_id = l.svc_id and l.client_id1 = #{client_id1}

select c.name, c.client_id, s.* , case s.knd when 1 then '돌봄 서비스' when 2 then '산책 서비스' else '훈련 서비스' end as knd_name, l.enroll_dt, l.reser_no, l.svc_stts, case l.svc_stts when 0 then '수락한 의뢰' when 1 then '완료한 의뢰' else '거절한 의뢰' end as status from reser_list l, svc s, client c, trainer t where l.client_id2 = t.client_id and l.client_id1 = c.client_id and s.svc_id = l.svc_id and t.client_id = #{client_id2}

select c.name, c.client_id, s.* , case s.knd when 1 then '돌봄 서비스' when 2 then '산책 서비스' else '훈련 서비스' end as knd_name, l.reser_dt, l.reser_no, b.bill_amt, l.enroll_dt from reser_list l, svc s, client c, trainer t, bill b where l.client_id2 = t.client_id and l.client_id1 = c.client_id and l.reser_no = b.reser_no and s.svc_id = l.svc_id and t.client_id = #{client_id2}

select distinct s.term , case s.knd when 1 then '돌봄 서비스' when 2 then '산책 서비스' else '훈련 서비스' end as knd_name, l.reser_dt, l.svc_bgn_tm, l.reser_loc, l.memo, b.bill_amt, l.enroll_dt, p.* from reser_list l, svc s, bill b, pet p where l.reser_no = b.reser_no and s.svc_id = l.svc_id and p.client_id = l.client_id1 and l.reser_no = ${reser_no} and l.client_id1 = ${client_id}
mapper.update: update reser_list set svc_stts = 1 where reser_no = #{reser_no}
